sentences.en: (= there’s a very big difference ) between us.
sentences.cn: 我们之间有着天壤之别。

sentences.en: a fashion show &B{with a difference}.
sentences.cn: 一场别具一格的时装秀。

sentences.en: an adventure holiday with a difference
sentences.cn: 非同一般的历险度假

sentences.en: As one former customer said cynically, "He's probably pocketed the difference!"
sentences.cn: 正如一位愤世嫉俗的旧主顾所说的那样，“他很可能把差额塞进了自己的腰包！”

sentences.en: Both teams had tied on points and goal difference.
sentences.cn: 两支队伍得分和净胜球都相当。

sentences.en: His failures underline the difference between theatre and film direction.
sentences.cn: 他的失败说明了导演戏剧和电影是不同的。

sentences.en: It's here that we come up against the difference of approach.
sentences.cn: 我们就是在这一点上面临方法上的分歧。

sentences.en: Nothing I do makes any difference anyway, so why bother?
sentences.cn: 既然我做什么都于事无补，我为什么还要费劲呢？

sentences.en: Perhaps your force of argument might have made some difference.
sentences.cn: 或许是你的雄辩使情况发生了变化。

sentences.en: Research shows a wide difference in tastes around the country.
sentences.cn: 研究表明全国各地的口味大有不同。

sentences.en: the Act will &B{make no difference to} my business.
sentences.cn: 这个法案对我的生意不会有什么影响。

sentences.en: The age difference was a complication to the rela-tionship.
sentences.cn: 年龄差异使得双方交往更加困难。

sentences.en: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
sentences.cn: 你是什么样的人和你想成为什么样的之间的差距就是，你做了什么。

sentences.en: The difference is, you are Anglo-Saxons, we are Latins.
sentences.cn: 差异在于，你们是英国血统，而我们是拉丁裔的。

sentences.en: The only difference between us is the colour of our skins.
sentences.cn: 我们之间唯一的差别就是肤色。

sentences.en: The problem simply resulted from a difference of opinion.
sentences.cn: 这个问题仅仅是由于意见分歧引起的。

sentences.en: There has always been a difference between community radio and commercial radio.
sentences.cn: 社区广播电台和商业广播电台一直是有区别的。

sentences.en: There is a big difference in the amounts that banks charge.
sentences.cn: 银行的收费在数额上有很大的不同。

sentences.en: There’s a big difference between knowing that something is true, and being able to prove it.
sentences.cn: 知道什么正确与能够证明它正确，这之间有很大的不同。

sentences.en: There’s a world of difference (= there’s a very big difference ) between us.
sentences.cn: 我们之间有着天壤之别。

sentences.en: There's not much difference in price between the two computers.
sentences.cn: 这两种计算机价格上没有多大的差别。

sentences.en: We have our differences , but she's still my sister.
sentences.cn: 我们之间虽然不和，但她仍旧是我的妹妹。

sentences.en: What set tongues wagging was the age difference between the two partners.
sentences.cn: 这对伴侣年龄上的差异招来了不少闲话。

words.tran_cn: 不同的；个别的，与众不同的

phrases.tran_cn: 对某人（或某个环境）产生重大影响（或没有影响）
产生很大的不同；意义重大；有很大影响
有影响，很重要；产生差别
压力差；差压；压力补偿器；气压梯度
有新（或不同寻常）的特点（或处理方法）的

trans.tran_en: a way in which two or more people or things are not like each other
